One heart -- cheerleader in a Texas town is told she can't be part of the squad anymore and now her mother is fighting back. Freshman cheerleader Brittany Davila has never let Down syndrome get in the way of her enjoying life and cheering on her team but suddenly. School officials at deer park high school say she can't be on the sidelines anymore with -- squad. Because it's a liability.
